lead_paragraph: Teva Pharmaceuticals wants to join PhRMA, a powerful trade association, raising alarm among drug companies facing disputes over high prices.

headline.print_headline: Drug Group Considering a Producer of Generics
headline.main: Brand-Name Drug Makers Wary of Letting Generic Rival Join Their Club

snippet: Teva Pharmaceuticals wants to join PhRMA, a powerful trade association, raising alarm among drug companies facing disputes over high prices....
abstract: Pharmaceutical industry has been shaken following move by Teva Pharmaceutical Industries, world's largest generic drug company, to join Pharmaceutical Research and Manufacturers of America, trade group representing interests of brand-name producers; move has raised alarm among lobbyists and companies facing legal battles with generic producers over drug pricing.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Pharmaceutical Research and Manufacturers of America
